allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add CLAUDE.md for Claude Code guidance

Provides architecture overview, key design decisions, LSP setup,
formatting configuration, and essential keymaps for AI assistance.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(fish -c "source ~/.config/fish/config.fish && echo ''Config recargado'' && cd /tmp && pwd && cd ~ && pwd")
Bash(fish -c 'echo ""Session name would be: $\(basename $PWD\)""; command zellij list-sessions 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo ""No active sessions""')
